Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements. Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Sr. Consultant - 4-6yrs (8 postions)3 Lead - 6+ yrs (4 positions)Mode: Initial Hybrid (For Training) Post that WFH Experience and skills: â— 6-8 years of experience in U.S. healthcare benefits (preferred), with a proven track record in leading configuration teams, defining and implementing best practices, executing complex projects and configurations, and managing implementation and renewal processes. â— Expert in U.S. healthcare benefits implementation and configuration of SaaS products, with a focus on leading the end-to-end implementation process and ensuring quality at every stage. â— In-depth knowledge of U.S. healthcare benefits (preferred), including PPO, HDHP, HMO, HSA, HRA, Premium & Surcharge, with expertise in assessing eligibility based on employee population, plans, salaries, location, union groups, etc., to manage complex implementations or renewal. â— Excellent communication skills required for effectively collaborating with both internal and external stakeholders. â— Expertise in complex data entry, quality assurance, and general attention to detail and problem solving. Key Responsibilities: â— Lead configuration teams, define and implement best practices, oversee complex projects and configurations, and make informed decisions even when all information isnâ€™t clear or available. â— Take ownership of the full implementation lifecycle, from gathering requirements, translating customer needs into actionable configurations, to conducting thorough testing and quality assurance (QA). â— Use a fundamental level of knowledge of the relevant tools, products, and processes to support the team in the building, review, and delivery of custom versions of ALEX and other SaaS products. Oversee complex, custom customer requests to ensure they are handled accurately and on time. â— Perform rigorous testing and quality assurance (QA) to ensure healthcare benefits configurations are functional, reliable, and user-friendly. Troubleshoot and resolve issues quickly to maintain the quality of implementation. â— Leverage tools like JIRA, Confluence, and other modern tools for task tracking, documentation, and effective communication across teams. â— Manage multiple, concurrent implementations, balancing deadlines and ensuring each project meets its timeline while maintaining the highest standards of quality. â— Provide leadership in troubleshooting and resolving complex implementation issues, ensuring practical solutions are delivered to meet customer needs and enhance operational efficiency. Interested candidates - please share your CVs at info@nsww.in ashutosh@nsww.in
